summary: Tested photography guides drag-and-drop reordering and image display functionality. Backend APIs working correctly (10/10 tests passed). Admin UI with drag-and-drop is functional.

issues: MUI Grid deprecated props warnings (item, xs, sm, md) - cosmetic, not blocking functionality

critical_code_review_comments: Photography guides image_url field is present but currently null for all guides - Admin needs to upload illustration images for the guides to display them in frontend listing form
seed_data_creation: Created test user test2@test.com for frontend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Photography guides drag-and-drop reordering is fully functional. Admin dashboard accessed via /api/admin-ui/ URL. Backend reorder API at PUT /api/admin/photography-guides/reorder/{category_id}. Frontend displays guides with image_url when available. Currently all guides have null image_url - need to upload images via admin to see them in frontend.

drag_drop_reordering.details: Drag handles visible (DragIndicatorIcon), 'Drag & Drop Enabled' banner shows, reorder API saves new order correctly

photography_guides_api.details: Public API returns guides sorted by order, admin API supports CRUD and reorder

image_url_display.details: Frontend code correctly renders images when image_url is present, but all guides currently have null image_url

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/photography-guides/public/{cate: Working - returns guides with image_url field
